com.bragi.sonify.music

Class SongWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bragi.sonify.music.SongWriter
  • Deprecated.

    public class SongWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class offers a framework to create MIDI tracks by simply providing pitch, note value and instrument for every note, one after another. In addition, one can specify general parameters like beats per minute. These tracks are combined to form a sequence which can be written to a MIDI file.
    Author:
    Jan-Christoph Klie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SongWriter.TrackHandle
      Deprecated. 
      This class acts as a handle for the tracks of the SongWriter, since these are just stored internally.

      Creates a clean SongWriter with no tracks and default pulses per quarter (24).

      Deprecated. 
      Creates a clean SongWriter with no tracks and given pulses per quarter.

        bpm - The new tempo of the track, given in beats per minute

      • addInterval

        public void addInterval(SongWriter.TrackHandle handle,
               Pitch note,
               NoteValue duration,
               Interval interval)
                 throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Deprecated. 
        Adds a node specified by an interval from a given note. The added note has the value of the specified note plus the value of the interval
        Parameters:
        handle - The handle for the track to set the instrument for
        note - The note which is the reference for the interval.
        duration - The duration of the note
        interval - The interval of the note to add in comparison to the old.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

      • endTrack

        public void endTrack(SongWriter.TrackHandle handle)
              throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Deprecated. 
        Tells the SongWriter to finish this track. After that, the specified track is closed for mutations and can be saved if all other tracks of this SongWriter instance have been ended, too.
        Parameters:
        track - The handle for the track to end
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

      • getSequence

        public javax.sound.midi.Sequence getSequence()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the sequence of this SongWriter instance
        Returns:
        One Sequence to rule them all, One Sequence to find them, One Sequence to bring them all and in the darkness bind them In the Land of MIDI where the Shadows lie.

      • play

        public void play()
          throws javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException,
                 javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Plays the song of this SongWriter instance. Make sure that all tracks are ended properly before invoking this function.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        java.io.IOException
